message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to start our negotiation at a price of $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12000?

I understand that $12000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can do $14000, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13000?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $13500, which is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. I'm still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13250?
I've made a few concessions already, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $14000. I'm willing to meet you at $13500, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. Can you meet me at $13750?
I understand your concerns, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13625?
